when I started my lab I was engaged in a

because they don't look any

definitely
not something that you should listen to

electrostatic assembly was that we would
be able to replace a more traditional
polymer coating that is going to have
some limitation and how much drug it can
contain because of polymer
thermodynamics so you'll have low
loadings usually requires solvent and

biologic drug delivery
you know also doesn't give you control

the idea was that you could build up

different times and that this would give

because thermodynamics are now on your
side and you can load up a lot in this

can incorporate biologic drugs like

this can be combined with the

films and the work that we've done has
